patterns: how do i register for units in the portal
responses: Log In to the student's portal page Here and click on the menu icon to the following dropdown, click on academics, then course registration as shown below you'll then be taken to the registration page and you'll see an a button on 'new course registration' as shown below. The button will be functional when it turns green.
go to the portal and click reset password, you'll be prompted with a message telling you to enter your email address so that a password reset link is sent to you.

Go to the moodle and click on the 'forgot username or password' link as shown below You'll then be provided with a form to search for your username or email as shown below and then am email will be sent to you with a link to reset your password.

patterns: When is the deadline for unit registration
